sentences.simplifiedText: 这项投资给我带来了很大的利益。
sentences.traditionalText: 這項投資給我帶來了很大的利益。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè xiàng tóuzī gěi wǒ dài lái le hěn dà de lìyì.
sentences.translation: This investment has brought me great benefits.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管这项决定可能短期内不会带来实质性的利益，但长期来看，它对公司的影响是积极的。
sentences.traditionalText: 盡管這項決定可能短期內不會帶來實質性的利益，但長期來看，它對公司的影響是積極的。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn zhè xiàng juédìng kěnéng duǎnqí nèi bù huì dài lái shízhìxìng de lìyì, dàn chángqī lái kàn, tā duì gōngsī de yǐngxiǎng shì jījí de.
sentences.translation: Although this decision may not bring substantial benefits in the short term, in the long term, its impact on the company is positive.
